title: ‘Storage Proofs’ Touted as Alternative to Hack-Prone Bridges in Multichain World
description: Storage proofs, a feature that could minimize cross-chain exploits by allowing users to keep their assets on one chain and prove that it's there on a different chain, will go live on Starknet soon.

title: Starknet Foundation Appoints Meta Veteran Oliva as First CEO
description: The executive will help the non-profit promote growth within the Starknet ecosystem.

title: Polygon Introduces AI Interface Powered by ChatGPT to Aid App Developers
description: The interface, called Polygon Copilot, will help developers obtain analytics and insights for their applications on the Polygon blockchain.

title: Fed Chair Powell Says Central Bank Needs ‘Robust’ Role Overseeing U.S. Stablecoins
description: Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell argued for the need for strong central-bank oversight in stablecoin regulations being crafted by lawmakers in the House Financial Services Committee.

title: Powell says stablecoins are a ‘form of money’ that central banks should supervise
description:
U.S. Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said the regulator views payment stablecoins as a “form of money” and believes central banks should supervise them. Powell made the statement in response to Congresswoman Maxine Waters asking whether stablecoin issuers should be licensed and regulated by the Fed during a June 21 hearing. Waters said that stablecoins […]

The post Powell says stablecoins are a ‘form of money’ that central banks should supervise appeared first on CryptoSlate.
